title: Breaking Up
description: Cari Champion sits down with ESPN NBA Insider Brian Windhorst to discuss Kyrie Irving's trade demand, the leadership of LeBron James and the relationship between the two players. Plus, a new "Honest 30" segment where Brian weighs in on the future of the Lakers.
